mapper.sql: id, ass_id, photo_url, effective, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into pet_base_photo
id,
ass_id,
photo_url,
effective,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update pet_base_photo
ass_id = #{assId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
photo_url = #{photoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
effective = #{effective,jdbcType=BIT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pet_base_photo set ass_id = #{assId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, photo_url = #{photoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, effective = #{effective,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT photo_url AS photoUrl FROM pet_base_photo WHERE ass_id = #{id} ORDER BY update_time
